p: Many different plants have been utilized since centuries for improving symptoms such as coughing, weakness and digestive system disorders as well as alleviating anxiety. Plant products such as crude extracts, extract of a specific part i.e. roots, stem, flowers, fruits and seeds, plant-derived chemicals, and nutraceuticals are widely applied in dealing with general ailments including minor cough, flu to complex chest infections. In fact, the one-fourth of the most commonly employed medicinal compounds contain plant-based component.
